divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 2:30 am., I fell asleep watching tv. A humming or whirring noise woke me up. I went out to porch, the UFO was hovering above my neighbors trailer across the street. I ran back in the house, locked the door. Aliens came and tried to get at me from outside. I called my dad to come help me and he didnt believe it was happening. I ran in the middle of my house, not knowing which direction the aliens were going to come from to get me. I tried numerous time to call 911 but my cell phone kept going off. I finally got through to 911 and the dispatcher laughed and asked me how much i had to drink that night. (i wasnt drunk,drinking or on drugs) I have pictures printed from my cell phone, its grainy but you can see the ufo. I also have the original cell phone with original photos taken.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rathdrum
There were no other sightings in Rathdrum on or around September 26th 2008
Summary: woke me up. called 911 for help.
